attributes.action:
Being an international
Student I want the government to change that decision
attributes.additional_details: Meanwhile students are the ones who are doing all the jobs which no one wants to do. Students are the ones who contribute 83 billion to this economy last year. They should be allowed to switch because opportunities never wait for anyone to let complete their studies and we do have the same rights like everyone. Being the resident of this country I’m filing this petition and it’s a request to all the employees who work for the government. Long live Britishers and live long England
attributes.background: As we all know that the international students can’t change their tier 4 visa to tier 2. I’ve filled this petition for  all the people who voted for yes to stop the switching

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641313
